001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models;
002
003import java.util.HashSet;
004import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
005import java.util.Set;
006import java.util.TreeSet;
007
008public enum MultiDay {
009    MONDAY(1),
010    TUESDAY(2),
011    WEDNESDAY(4),
012    THURSDAY(8),
013    FRIDAY(16),
014    SATURDAY(32),
015    SUNDAY(64),
016    ;
017
018    public static final Set<MultiDay> ALL_DAYS = fromBitmask(127);
019
020    private final int id;
021
022    MultiDay(int id) {
023        this.id = id;
024    }
025
026    public int id() {
027        return id;
028    }
029
030    public static Set<MultiDay> fromBitmask(int bitmask) {
031        Set<MultiDay> set = new TreeSet<>();
032        for (MultiDay day : values()) {
033            if (bitmask % day.id() == 0) {
034                set.add(day);
035            }
036        }
037
038        return set;
039    }
040
041    public static int toBitmask(MultiDay... days) {
042        int mask = 0;
043        for (MultiDay day : days) {
044            mask += day.id();
045        }
046
047        return mask;
048    }
049}
